pydra.pydra module¶

class pydra.pydra.Pydra(connections: Optional[dict] = None, modules: list = (), savers: list = ())[source]¶

Bases: pydra.core.pydraobjects.main.PydraMain

Main user class for creating a configured Pydra instance.

static configure(modules=(), savers=(), config: Optional[dict] = None, public: Optional[pydra.configuration.PortManager] = None, private: Optional[pydra.configuration.PortManager] = None)[source]¶

Generates a configuration dictionary (stored in config class attribute).

Parameters

  • modules (tuple) – List of modules to include in configuration.

  • savers (tuple) – List of savers to include in configuration.

  • config (dict (optional)) – A pre-configured dictionary.

  • public (configuration.PortManager (optional)) – Ports to use for frontend zmq connections.

  • private (configuration.PortManager (optional)) – Ports to use for backend zmq connections.

name = 'pydra'¶
